name: Living a Conscious Life: The Podcast

episodes.title: Guru Gone Bad? The Unflattering Truth About Prem Rawat: Interview with Paul Drescher
episodes.description: Don Johnson interviews Paul Drescher, an ex-follower of Prem Rawat.  We discuss our experiences as young men in what we now know was and still is a cult.

episodes.title: In the Shadow of Enlightenment with Sarito Carroll: A Girl's Journey Through the Osho Rajneesh Cult
episodes.description: This is my interview with Sarito Carroll, a survivor of the Osho Rajneesh Cult and author of her newly released memoir, In the Shadow of Enlightenment: A Girl's Journey Through the Osho Rajneesh Cult.

episodes.title: Prem Rawat: The Dark Star of India? His Recent Attempt to Silence Me
episodes.description:
On this podcast I discuss my response to the intimidation letter sent to a podcast host by a law firm hired by Prem Rawat. 

The letter warned her of possible litigation if she allowed me to spread defamatory statements about Prem Rawat on her show. 

I also discuss several other related topics.
